data.answer: Direct methods followed by successive difference Fourier methods.

What is the main difference between CPM-5 and CPM-5' in terms of structure?
data.answer: In CPM-5', two-thirds of In3+ sites on the In24 cage are also bonded to H2O.

data.question: Can CPM-5' be converted to CPM-5 by heating?

What is the main advantage of the cage-within-cage architecture in CPM-5 for gas sorption?
data.answer: It partitions the pore space into small charge-separated domains.

data.question: Is the BET surface area of CPM-6 higher than that of CPM-5?
What is the effect of adding 4,4'-bipyridine in the synthesis of CPM-5'?
data.answer: It changes the coordination of the monomeric indium site on the outer In24 cage.
